aboutText: Hello, my name is Bilal Bhatti. I am a junior software developer. I Like to solve problems. Since from my childhood I love to play with computers. After enrolling in Engineering studies my interest in the field computer science gets increased. During the studies I worked upon many small and medium size projects. Where I started working in teams. Today, I am a full stack Javascript developer, that love to build new and elegent sites that empowers the business to run smoothly...

education.institution: Mehran University of Engineering and Technology, Jamshoro
